name: RAGE MOW'D
description:
This game was made for the 2020 GMTK game jam.

Story:

You just wanted to mow your lawn, and then it happend: You've lost control over your lawn mower again.

Controls:

For the level with no throttle control use your a left and right arrow keys to steer the lawn mower. When you repaired the lawn mower, you can use the up arrow key to control the throttle.

For the level with no steering control use your arrow up arrow  key to steer the lawn mower. When you repaired the lawn mower, you can use the left and right arrow keys to control the steering.

Goals:

Mow the lawn as good as possible, repair it by collecting the tools and parts (3 pieces) and avoid crashing into the fences and trees.
